document_data.name: Dekoran Boatwright
document_data.mainbody: '''Dekoran Boatwright''' was a massive shipyard located in the town of [[Daggerford]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The building was located in the town's [[River Quarter]], on Hill Road.
document_data.Services: Dekoran's specialized in the construction of fishing [[boat]]s, [[raft]]s, [[canoe]]s, and other smaller river-worthy vessels.
document_data.History: While the businesses' owner Dekoran sought to build larger ships and compete with the nearby [[Mikitan Shipyards]], he ran into some complications. The adjacent Hill Road, which granted access to the town's dock, was not large enough to navigate larger vessels within its boundaries.
